alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 2:00PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday evening and continue rising to a crest of 20.5 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.1 feet on 01/25/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 17.8 Sun 12 pm CD 19.3 19.8 20.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tonight between 800 PM and 1000 PM CDT.
